name.baseName: Steam/hot water/other ; Heavy oil ; Chamber furnace ; All sizes; NESPS2
蒸汽/热水/其它 ; 重油 ; 室燃炉 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisS12 Others (sodium alkali method)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisS12 Others (sodium alkali method)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集描述了用于处理燃油室炉（适用于所有规模）产生的废气、二氧化硫、烟尘和氮氧化物的各种末端治理污染技术。这些技术适用于产生此类排放的工业环境，包括发电厂、制造设施和废物焚烧厂。所概述的方法包括二氧化硫的石灰石/石膏法、双碱法、氧化镁法、氨法、旋转喷雾干燥法、烟道气循环流化床法和钠碱法，以及烟尘的文丘里、离心水膜、喷雾塔/水震浴和袋式过滤器，以及氮氧化物的SCR。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,四级代码4430文件，在完整版文件中第5449页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Flue dustisBag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99
污染物指标烟尘的末端治理技术是袋式除尘，其效率为99，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为K=除尘设施年运行小时数/锅炉年运行小时数。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为烟尘，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为烟尘
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Flue dustisCentrifugal water film，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management87
污染物指标烟尘的末端治理技术是离心水膜，其效率为87，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为K=除尘设施年运行小时数/锅炉年运行小时数。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为烟尘，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为烟尘
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Flue dustisSpray tower/water shock bath，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management87

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Flue dustisVenturi，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management87
污染物指标烟尘的末端治理技术是文丘里，其效率为87，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为K=除尘设施年运行小时数/锅炉年运行小时数。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为烟尘，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为烟尘

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen oxidesisSCR，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management67
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是选择性催化还原法（SCR），其效率为67，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为K=脱硝设施年运行小时数/锅炉年运行小时数。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氮氧化物

Pollutant indicator of sulfur dioxide is /, its efficiency is 0. The original document describes the pollutant category as exhaust gas, the pollutant indicator of sulfur dioxide, here it is matched to the LCAflow library to match the most compatible flow, pollutant indicator note for sulfur dioxide, the coefficient of production note for the coefficient of production of the coefficient of sulfur dioxide of the coefficient of production of sulfur dioxide is expressed in the form of the sulfur content (S%), where the sulfur content (S%) is expressed in the form of the sulfur content (S%). The form of sulfur content (S%), where sulfur content (S%) refers to the fuel received base sulfur content, expressed in the form of mass percent. For example, if the sulfur content (S%) of the fuel is 0.1%, then S=0.1. The production coefficient described in the original text is 19 S. Please revise the corresponding emissions after calculating by yourself according to the remarks.

污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为二氧化硫，产污系数备注为产污系数表中二氧化硫的产污系数是以含硫量（S％）的形式表示的，其中含硫量（S％）是指燃油收到基硫分含量，以质量百分数的形式表示。例如燃料中含硫量（S％）为0.1％，则S=0.1。原文描述的产污系数为 19S。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisAmmonia method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 19S。Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.。.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 19S. Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.
